text: Hey Juba, hope you've had a lovely christmas break and a great start to the new year! I'm so sorry for the lack of updates and response recently, I just had a couple of assignments to submit but gladly they're done now :)

Its really cool to hear how you started off though and found your way to Framestore, as well as the many jobs you can have after graduating - how did you find working as a remote animator/freelancer by the way?

Also yeah I've been loving my time at university, feels like it's gone so quick though! Suddenly I'm in my final year and semester and I wonder where all that time went haha.
I do have a final year project yesss, in summary it's stylised short film/ad about a spy infiltrating a secret base to steal the most delicious burger (we've decided to call it the 'Martini Burger' to fit the spoofy spy theme we're going for ;) ) - it's about 45 secs long so short and sweet (and savoury)!
I actually do have an animation I made recently that I've been meaning to show you, it's a stylised lipsync piece that was a bit of fun to make: <https://syncsketch.com/sketch/3de0918ae621/#1275923/1309476|https://syncsketch.com/sketch/3de0918ae621/#1275923/1309476>
It would be brilliant to get your take on it though, any pointers/changes are greatly appreciated!

attachments.text: Review media collaboratively in the cloud - no setup, visual creative feedback, all real time with just a link.
attachments.fallback: Review media collaboratively in the cloud - no setup, visual creative feedback, all real time with just a link.

text: I've also got a creature anim that I'm working on currently - I decided to animate a warthog but its very much early stages :sweat_smile:
